jspsych-instructions.description: If checked, then trial will end when subject responds

parameters.name: stimulus
parameters.description: The image to be displayed

parameters.name: stimulus_height
parameters.description: Set the image height in pixels

parameters.name: stimulus_width
parameters.description: Set the image width in pixels

parameters.name: maintain_aspect_ratio
parameters.description: Maintain the aspect ratio after setting width or height

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Any content here will be displayed under the buttons

parameters.name: choices
parameters.description: An array of labels for the buttons

parameters.name: button_html
parameters.description: The html of the button. Usually used to style the button.

parameters.name: stimulus_duration
parameters.description: How long to hide the stimulus

parameters.name: trial_duration
parameters.description: How long to show the trial

parameters.name: response_ends_trial
parameters.description: If checked, then trial will end when subject responds
